definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: Pf. 3 ms. [[נׇעַל]] 2Sa 13:18, [[נׇעָָל]] Ju Jdg 3:23; Imv. [[נְעׂל]] 2Sa 13:17; Pt. pass. [[נׇעוּל]] Ct So 4:12, So 4:12; fpl. [[נְעֻלוֹת]] Ju Jdg 3:24; —bar, bolt, lock, usu. c. acc. [[דֶּלֶת]], [[דְּלָתוֹת]]: Ju Jdg 3:23, + [[אַחֲרֵי]] after, behind, v:Jdg 3:24, 2Sa 13:17, 2Sa 13:18; elsewh. only [[גַּן נׇעוּל]] Ct So 4:12 a garden barred (fig. of Shulamite), so also v:So 4:12 b (reading [[גַּן]] for [[גַּל]], Vrss Gr Bu).
